column7: For doctoral students who have a guaranteed student loan that needs deferral, have completed the credit requirements for the doctorate, have passed the preliminary examination, do not have any financial assistance that would cover tuition and fees, and are eligible to register for 599 in their own academic units. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated.
column9: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated.
column11: Course is intended for Loan Deferral. Must have passed preliminary examination. Must not have tuition and fee waiver to register. Deans approval may be requested by completing the application form found at http://www.grad.uiuc.edu/forms/GC599.pdf.
